verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: he will not invite LeBron James , Stephen Curry , the Cavaliers or Warriors to the White House following the conclusion of this year 's NBA Finals] .
Trump said he [V: will] not invite LeBron James , Stephen Curry , the Cavaliers or Warriors to the White House following the conclusion of this year 's NBA Finals .

Trump said [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: invite] [ARG1: LeBron James , Stephen Curry , the Cavaliers or Warriors] [ARG2: to the White House] [ARGM-TMP: following the conclusion of this year 's NBA Finals] .
Trump said he will not invite LeBron James , Stephen Curry , the Cavaliers or Warriors to the White House [V: following] [ARG2: the conclusion of this year 's NBA Finals] .
